thread.title: UV Map keeps rendering as black.

post.author: Arudius
post.body:
I've got my uv map setup exactly how I want it but when I go to render it under tools>render uv template it just shows a black screen.

I was following a tutorial and I followed it to the letter, keep reading over it and haven't been able to find anything I'm not doing.

Heres a screenshot.

http://www.visioninvention.com/wtf.jpg

Any help is appreciated, thanks.

post.author: 6th Venom
post.body:
I don't see any "projection" modifier, so i suppose you want to render-to-texture a multi-materials texture model on itself, as a "simple" texture?

i'd like to see the render-to-texture window with your options checked (screenshot), cause it can be a lot of things.
